Description: On I-77 at mile marker 1 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south exit ramp is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 50.6 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
